game.title: Disciples: Sacred Realm
game.beginning: In some deep forgotten cavern fallen from grace, an ancient evil stirs.
game.ending: Amidst the battle's chaos and ruin, a hero rises to vanquish Drakantos, the eternal threat.
game.synopsis: Embark on an epic quest as you, a shadowy initiate of the Netherworld, prevent the dragon from unleashing its ancient malevolence. Unravel divine prophecies and forge alliances with both human and mystical forces to confront the primordial darkness that awaits.
